content.html: When he's not sabotaging safeguards against digital misinformation and hate, Or laying off thousands of employees, Elon Musk is running a company that performs cruel and deadly tests on animals?   Doesn’t sound like a genius to me. Not even an unstable one.
content.value:
When he's not sabotaging safeguards against digital misinformation and hate, 

Or laying off thousands of employees,

Elon Musk is running a company that performs cruel and deadly tests on animals?
 
Doesn’t sound like a genius to me. 

Not even an unstable one.
